DOC.brief_title: Effect Evaluation The International Child Development Programme ( ICDP )
DOC.detailed_description: The International Child Development Programme ( ICDP ) psychosocial preventive programme offer parent caregiver . The programme aim improve parenting practice thereby child development well-being . The ICDP design influence improve quality contact relation caregiver , usually parent , child practical application eight theme guideline positive interaction . ICDP course implement group format include group discussion , caregiver assignment , report back sequence eight meeting . The caregiver group lead facilitator train ICDP , competence lead group . The aim study evaluate ICDP effect caregiver 's positive involvement sensitivity childrens emotion , parental self-efficacy . The study also evaluate effect ICDP caregiver-child relationship , child 's development well-being . The study use stratify cluster randomize control design , implement regular clinical practice Norway . More knowledge within field important practitioner well policy maker plan preventive intervention caregiver ant child .
DOC.criteria: Caregivers child age 018 year , general Norwegian population Participants must able speak write adequately Norwegian Not child 018 year Insufficient Norwegian language skill ICDP impose resolution Fylkesnemnda
